alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 1:29PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lander County through 200 PM PDT... At 129 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 31 miles west of Grass Valley, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
